title: Bus Driver
description: Bus driver required for School Runs in Dublin area. Drivers must be of a kind and caring nature. The majority of our routes collect children with special needs, an escort will be on board to look after children. Drivers must have D or D1 driving licence. CPC must be up to date. Fluent English is a necessity. Unfortunately due to contractual restrictions, applicants must be aged 69 and under. Previous experience is an advantage but not essential
